ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s too bad the ppl you hang out with feel that way...I mean sure a warrior needs it more than a bard, but you should be in the order somewhere. ... Well
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trade of the Century..
>Date: Wed, 13 Oct 1999 10:52:25 -0700
>
>Party says 'Who gets it? Someone who can use it. No casters
> and the bard doesn't need it. Here Warrior.'
>

It's too bad the ppl you hang out with feel that way...I mean sure a warrior
needs it more than a bard, but you should be in the order somewhere.

>
>Who in their right mind is gonna give a bard a Ykesha or fbbs?
>Twinked: someone handed those items to the person through guild
>connections. Plus going on their knowledge alone, I would say
>they didnt earn them (or someone bought an Ebay account, muhaha)
>
>Sorry for the confusion. =)
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>

Well - if they didn't EARN it that's a different story. I just do the job
I'm supposed to do and eventually things come around full circle. I
definitely think I've earned everything I own. I think I've earned an fbss
too, just waiting for the bastard to drop it, however I WILL put myself
below melee types in loot order unless they are late-comers to the camp. =P

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
